p: The in vivo antimicrobial activity of oregano EO nanoemulsion was assessed where bacterial counts of P. acnes dropped from 1 × 10 8 to 4.3 × 10 1 CFU/mL post-treatment with 0.672 mg/mL of oregano nanoemulsion ( Figure 6). In contrast, the bacterial number for the negative control group (treated with PBS buffer) was maintained at 5 × 10 5 CFU/mL, whereas the positive control treated with erythromycin solution reduced the bacterial number to 3.5 × 10 3 CFU/mL.
